title: Specifying bootstrap-node via YAML config fails
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description I was attempting to add the Medalla bootnodes to my YAML config file, but got an error. I tried a few different ways of including it, but all failed. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? Never tried this before. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction Start beacon chain using YAML config including any of the four variations. ``` bootstrap-node: enr:-LK4QKWk9yZo258PQouLshTOEEGWVHH7GhKwpYmB5tmKE4eHeSfman0PZvM2Rpp54RWgoOagAsOfKoXgZSbiCYzERWABh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAgmlkgnY0gmlwhDQlA5CJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQOYiWqrQtQksTEtS3qY6idxJE5wkm0t9wKqpzv2gCR21oN0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo,enr:-LK4QEnIS-PIxxLCadJdnp83VXuJqgKvC9ZTIWaJpWqdKlUFCiup2sHxWihF9EYGlMrQLs0mq_2IyarhNq38eoaOHUoBh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAgmlkgnY0gmlwhA37LMaJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQJ7k0mKtTd_kdEq251flOjD1HKpqgMmIETDoD-Msy_O-4N0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo,enr:-KG4QIOJRu0BBlcXJcn3lI34Ub1aBLYipbnDaxBnr2uf2q6nE1TWnKY5OAajg3eG6mHheQSfRhXLuy-a8V5rqXKSoUEChGV0aDKQGK5MywAAAAH__________4JpZIJ2NIJpcIQKAAFhiXNlY3AyNTZrMaEDESplmV9c2k73v0DjxVXJ6__2bWyP-tK28_80lf7dUhqDdGNwgiMog3VkcIIjKA ``` ``` bootstrap-node: enr:-LK4QKWk9yZo258PQouLshTOEEGWVHH7GhKwpYmB5tmKE4eHeSfman0PZvM2Rpp54RWgoOagAsOfKoXgZSbiCYzERWABh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAgmlkgnY0gmlwhDQlA5CJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQOYiWqrQtQksTEtS3qY6idxJE5wkm0t9wKqpzv2gCR21oN0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo bootstrap-node: enr:-LK4QEnIS-PIxxLCadJdnp83VXuJqgKvC9ZTIWaJpWqdKlUFCiup2sHxWihF9EYGlMrQLs0mq_2IyarhNq38eoaOHUoBh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAgmlkgnY0gmlwhA37LMaJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQJ7k0mKtTd_kdEq251flOjD1HKpqgMmIETDoD-Msy_O-4N0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo bootstrap-node: enr:-KG4QIOJRu0BBlcXJcn3lI34Ub1aBLYipbnDaxBnr2uf2q6nE1TWnKY5OAajg3eG6mHheQSfRhXLuy-a8V5rqXKSoUEChGV0aDKQGK5MywAAAAH__________4JpZIJ2NIJpcIQKAAFhiXNlY3AyNTZrMaEDESplmV9c2k73v0DjxVXJ6__2bWyP-tK28_80lf7dUhqDdGNwgiMog3VkcIIjKA ``` ``` bootstrap-node: enr:-KG4QIOJRu0BBlcXJcn3lI34Ub1aBLYipbnDaxBnr2uf2q6nE1TWnKY5OAajg3eG6mHheQSfRhXLuy-a8V5rqXKSoUEChGV0aDKQGK5MywAAAAH__________4JpZIJ2NIJpcIQKAAFhiXNlY3AyNTZrMaEDESplmV9c2k73v0DjxVXJ6__2bWyP-tK28_80lf7dUhqDdGNwgiMog3VkcIIjKA "enr:-KG4QIOJRu0BBlcXJcn3lI34Ub1aBLYipbnDaxBnr2uf2q6nE1TWnKY5OAajg3eG6mHheQSfRhXLuy-a8V5rqXKSoUEChGV0aDKQGK5MywAAAAH__________4JpZIJ2NIJpcIQKAAFhiXNlY3AyNTZrMaEDESplmV9c2k73v0DjxVXJ6__2bWyP-tK28_80lf7dUhqDdGNwgiMog3VkcIIjKA" ``` Adding as a command-line flag to my startup command works as expected. ## üî• Error 

Jul 31 22:54:46 nuc02 prysm.sh[438215]: time="2020-07-31T22:54:46Z" level=error msg="Mismatched type for flag 'bootstrap-node'. Expected '[]interface{}' but actual is 'string'" prefix=main
## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
  
Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
  
alpha.17
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?**

The yaml expects an array. Try this:
```yaml
bootstrap-node:
  - enr:-LK4QKWk9yZo258PQouLshTOEEGWVHH7GhKwpYmB5tmKE4eHeSfman0PZvM2Rpp54RWgoOagAsOfKoXgZSbiCYzERWABh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAgmlkgnY0gmlwhDQlA5CJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQOYiWqrQtQksTEtS3qY6idxJE5wkm0t9wKqpzv2gCR21oN0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo
  - enr:-LK4QEnIS-PIxxLCadJdnp83VXuJqgKvC9ZTIWaJpWqdKlUFCiup2sHxWihF9EYGlMrQLs0mq_2IyarhNq38eoaOHUoBh2F0dG5ldHOIAAAAAAAAAACEZXRoMpAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAgmlkgnY0gmlwhA37LMaJc2VjcDI1NmsxoQJ7k0mKtTd_kdEq251flOjD1HKpqgMmIETDoD-Msy_O-4N0Y3CCIyiDdWRwgiMo
  - enr:-KG4QIOJRu0BBlcXJcn3lI34Ub1aBLYipbnDaxBnr2uf2q6nE1TWnKY5OAajg3eG6mHheQSfRhXLuy-a8V5rqXKSoUEChGV0aDKQGK5MywAAAAH__________4JpZIJ2NIJpcIQKAAFhiXNlY3AyNTZrMaEDESplmV9c2k73v0DjxVXJ6__2bWyP-tK28_80lf7dUhqDdGNwgiMog3VkcIIjKA
```

Let me know if there is any way this could be more clear. I know it's not very intuitive but I don't have any ideas on how to make it better. 

I'm closing for now, but let me know if that doesn't work for you. Thanks!
